EmailTemplate.subject: ({!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.Name}) is RESOLVED. Please confirm by replying Yes or No to this email
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Incident {!BMCServiceDesk__Incident__c.Name} is RESOLVED. This is a 24 Hour final Notification. Please confirm by replying Yes or No to this email. If you do not respond the ticket will be closed
